transcript:
Customer: Hello team ji.

(silence)

Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji. Good evening sir, main Humera baat kar rahi thi, Mr. Giri baat kar rahe hain Ganpati Trader se.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Accha. Sir, aapke paas ek feedback aaya hoga aapke account manager ke liye. Aapne whatsapp pe mention kiya hai not satisfied. Call ka feedback aata hai aapke account manager ke liye. To koi problem aa rahi hai account manager se ya koi kuch issue hai kya sir aapko unke behavior mein ya is tarah kuch? To wahi jaanna tha. Haan ji. Haan ji.
Customer: Actually, problem actually dikkat kya hai madam, behavior mein koi dikkat nahi hai. Bande mein koi dikkat nahi hai. Actually, IndiaMART mein dikkat hai.
Customer: Jo main problem bol raha hu uska koi solution hi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Aapka jo discussion hua tha wo business and ROI ko leke hua tha ki aapko business nahi aa raha hai aur deal conversion wagera ko leke aapka hua tha aur I hope so aapka jo discussion hua tha wo renewal ko leke bhi hua hoga. Services and extra right? Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hmm. Sir, main jaanti hu is cheez ko leke lekin abhi aap bhi jaante hain jaise ki aapne services ko use kiya hai abhi first year hai. To response jo hota hai services ka wo thoda sa comparatively slow rehta hai lekin abhi aap dekhenge na kyunki aapne to card bhi ho gaya hai.
Customer: Hmm. Nahi wo wali baat nahi hai. Shuru shuru shuru mein madam maine kara hai conversion kara hai. Main ye nahi bol raha ki IndiaMART ne logo ko business nahi diya. Shuru mein wo business diya. But uske baad last che mahine se stop ho rakha hai bilkul hi nahi single query bhi mature nahi hui. Ya to ho na hum lead na utha rahe ho. To hamari galti hai.
Customer: Ki bhai aap log to lead de rahe ho hum us pe baat nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Sir, cheez wo wali nahi hai. Theek hai. Aap consume bhi kar rahe hain buylead aapko inquiry aa rahi hai kaafi calls bhi aa rahi hai although kuch calls miss bhi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Chalo madam, chalo madam main karta hu aapko na actually gym mein tha main to. Free ho ke karta hu.
Executive: Hmm. Baki mujhe ye bata dete ki customer matlab account manager se related to koi dikkat nahi hai aapki. Kyunki ye wala jo hai na wo slowly aapko business aata hi hai. Ye wali cheez hai.
Customer: Koi nahi abhi pehle aaram se kal discuss karte hain phir decide karte hain madam.
Executive: Thank you.
Customer: Abhi aap kitni abhi thodi der mein agar free ho rahe hain to main laga le rahi hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam abhi aaya hu mujhe dedh ghanta ek dedh ghanta lagega aaram se kam se kam.
Customer: Kal baat karte hain office aake sath mein baat karunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting business from IndiaMART.

- No mature queries in the last six months.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive mentioned the services response is slow.

- Executive stated customer is consuming buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after getting free.

- Customer will discuss in office tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, business, account manager, roi
